key.name: show-label
key.description: Display the name of the currently focused application next to its icon in the panel

key.name: hide-boxpointer
key.description: Do not show the menu arrow

key.name: panel-box
key.description: The panel area where the switcher should be placed (left, center, or right)

key.name: position-in-box
key.description: Fine-tunes the position within the chosen panel box (0 is default, negative moves left/up, positive moves right/down)

key.name: enable-keyboard-shortcuts
key.description: Activates custom shortcuts for enhanced window management

key.name: show-menu-hints
key.description: Displays keyboard shortcut hints next to menu items when shortcuts are enabled

key.name: hide-current-app
key.description: Hides all windows of the currently focused application

key.name: hide-others
key.description: Hides all windows except those belonging to the currently focused application

key.name: show-recent-app
key.description: Restores the most recently hidden application to view

key.name: show-all-apps
key.description: Restores all hidden apps and minimized windows on the current workspace

key.name: hide-windows-from-overview
key.description: When enabled, windows hidden with Super+H or Hide Others won't appear in Activities overview. This provides true "hide" functionality separate from minimize.

key.name: enable-overview-effects
key.description: Apply visual effects to windows in Activities Overview for improved clarity. When enabled: - Hidden windows appear fully greyscale (complete desaturation with darker appearance) - Minimized windows appear subtly greyscale (slight desaturation with lighter appearance) This helps distinguish between hidden, minimized, unfocused, and focused windows.
